props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute of the <input> or <textarea>

props.name: accept
props.description: Define the types of files that the control can select

props.name: multiple
props.description: Indicates whether the user can enter more than one value

props.name: disabled
props.description: Indicates whether the user can interact with the element

props.name: autoReset
props.description: Reset input after the file changed

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the fileupload text and can contain HTML

events.name: focus
events.description: Emitted when the fileupload is focused.

events.name: blur
events.description: Emitted when the fileupload loses focus.

events.name: change
events.description: Emitted when a change in the fileupload value is committed.
